room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - St. Louis in St. Louis
review: We had so much fun working together with Aurie, there were 4 of us & we all worked together. This was another fun time with the family! Highly recommend it

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - St. Louis in St. Louis
review: Matthew was super helpful, and the Mystery Mansion was challenging but fair for a group of 3 adults. The stories are lots of fun!

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - St. Louis in St. Louis
review: Mystery Mansion room was one of the best escape rooms I’ve played. Couldn’t have asked for a cooler game master than Austin whose clues and sense of humor were spot on.

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - St. Louis in St. Louis
review: Great staff and the game was amazing. We made it out!!! Clues were a little hard to follow and we had to get some help.

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - St. Louis in St. Louis
review: My husband's cousin and boyfriend was in from Ohio. We took them to the escape room. Nael was great. He helped us so much to meet our goal of escaping. Without his help we would have never made it out. We will definitely visit this place again.
